value.name: ‘A huge slap in the face’: Frustrations grow over cheerleading’s mishandled sexual misconduct cases
value.description: A USA TODAY investigation found a flawed process for handling reports in cheerleading, one that has allowed suspected abusers to remain around kids.

value.name: Teen Accused Of Stabbing Newark Man To Death In His Apartment
value.description: A 14-year-old juvenile has been accused of stabbing a Newark man to death in his apartment last weekend, authorities said. Jorge Martinez, 55, was stabbed in his Parker Street home in the predawn hours on Friday.

value.name: 14-Year-Old Charged In Stabbing Death Of Newark Man, 55

value.name: Man sustains head injury when driver hits parked cars
value.description: An 89-year-old man sustained a head injury after another driver crashed into two parked cars in Bloomfield Wednesday afternoon. According to information from Bloomfield Police Department, police and EMS were called to Perry Street around noon for an injury crash.
